recaps.1: Foundation Councilman Golan Trevize questions whether the Second Foundation truly exists, creating political controversy on Terminus with his persistent inquiries.
recaps.2: Mayor Harla Branno discusses the crisis with security chief Liono Kodell, while academic Janov Pelorat becomes interested in Trevize's questions about galactic history.
recaps.3: On Trantor, Second Foundation Speaker Stor Gendibal challenges the organization's conservative policies, believing they've become too passive in guiding galactic events.
recaps.4: The Second Foundation debates how to handle both Trevize's questions and Gendibal's activism, with older Speakers like Delora Delarmi opposing change.
recaps.5: Mayor Branno exiles Trevize from Terminus, sending him with Pelorat to search for the Second Foundation, secretly hoping to use him as a tool.
recaps.6: Trevize and Pelorat begin their journey aboard the advanced ship Far Star, while Foundation agent Munn Li Compor follows them with his own hidden agenda.
recaps.7: The travelers visit Comporellon, where they encounter officials like Minister Lizalor who hold secrets about Earth's forbidden status and location.
recaps.8: Gendibal travels among the primitive Hamish people with companion Sura Novi, investigating signs of a mysterious third faction manipulating galactic events.
recaps.9: On Comporellon, Trevize learns that Earth is considered radioactive and forbidden, while romantic complications arise with Minister Lizalor.
recaps.10: Gendibal discovers evidence of the third faction's influence and realizes that both Foundations may have been manipulated by an unknown power.
recaps.11: Trevize and Pelorat discover the planet Gaia, where they meet Bliss, a member of the collective planetary consciousness that comprises all life on the world.
recaps.12: The travelers visit the dead Spacer world of Aurora, learning about the ancient conflict between Spacers and Settlers while Compor reveals his Second Foundation loyalty.
recaps.13: On Solaria, they encounter the hermaphrodite Solarian Bander, who represents the extreme evolution of the isolationist Spacer society.
recaps.14: The group rescues young Fallom from Solaria after Bander's death, bringing the Solarian child with them as their ward despite the complications this creates.
recaps.15: Romantic relationships develop between Pelorat and Bliss, while the group learns more about Gaia's nature as a collective consciousness.
recaps.16: Dom, representing Gaia's planetary consciousness, explains the world's group mind philosophy and its vision for galactic evolution.
recaps.17: The Second Foundation realizes they are losing control of galactic events as Gendibal reports his findings about the third faction's manipulation.
recaps.18: Trevize's group continues investigating the mystery of Earth and humanity's origins while dealing with the challenges of caring for Fallom.
recaps.19: Representatives of all three factions - Foundation, Second Foundation, and Gaia - converge as the truth about galactic manipulation becomes clear.
recaps.20: Trevize's unique intuitive ability to make correct decisions becomes crucial as he must choose between different visions of galactic future.
recaps.21: The First Speaker of the Second Foundation confronts the reality that their millennium of guidance may be ending as new forces reshape the galaxy.
recaps.22: Gaia reveals itself as the hidden third faction that has been manipulating both Foundations, working toward creating a galaxy-wide group consciousness called Galaxia.
recaps.23: Trevize faces the momentous decision between three paths: the Foundation's individualistic expansion, the Second Foundation's mental guidance, or Gaia's collective consciousness.
recaps.24: Trevize chooses Gaia's path toward Galaxia, setting in motion the transformation of the galaxy into a collective consciousness while questions about Earth's role remain.
